author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
1.0.5 2023-10-09 - added _TZE204_nklqjk62 fingerprint
1.0.4 2022-07-06 - on() command opens the door if it was closed, off() command closes the door if it was open; 'contact is open/closed' info and warning logs are shown only on contact state change;
1.0.3 2022-06-26 - fixed new device exceptions bug; warnings in Debug logs only; Debug logs are off by default
1.0.2 2022-06-20 - ignore Open command if the sensor is open; ignore Close command if the sensor is closed.
1.0.0 2022-06-18 - first release version
